name: eon-ticket
effect: Provides access to southern island and either latias or latios, whichever is not available roaming around Hoenn.
short_effect: Provides access to Southern Island and Latias or Latios.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
The ticket for a
ferry to a distant
southern island.

The ticket for a
ferry to a distant
southern island.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The ticket required for sailing on a
ferry to a distant southern island.
It features a drawing of an island.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The ticket required for sailing on a ferry to the
Southern Island. Does Norman, the Petalburg Gym
Leader, know a secret?!
